content.rendered:
Your profile is a great way for others to learn more about you before they book your listing or message you. When your profile is robust, it helps others know that you’re reliable and authentic to the views of Roomi.

Whether you’re a lister or a mover, the more complete your profile is, the more views and requests you are likely to receive.

It’s required that at least one profile photo is of you. No buildings, animals, objects, landscapes, or anything else that isn’t you.

The only time someone is allowed to use a logo as a profile photo on Roomi is an approved partner. That means, in an active partnership with Roomi. A partner will have the trusted partner badge on their profile.
